verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> as long <S%G5550><s%> as the heir <S%G2818><s%> is a child, <S%G3516><s%> he does not differ <S%G1308><s%> at all <S%G3761><s%> from a slave <S%G1401><s%> although he is owner <S%G2962><s%> of everything, <S%G3956><s%>
but he is under <S%G5259><s%> guardians <S%G2012><s%> and managers <S%G3623><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the date <S%G4287><s%> set <S%G4287><s%> by the father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we, while <S%G3753><s%> we were children, <S%G3516><s%> were held <S%G1402><s%> in bondage <S%G1402><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the elemental <S%G4747><s%> things <S%G4747><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of the time <S%G5550><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> His Son, <S%G5207><s%> born <S%G1096><s%> of a woman, <S%G1135><s%> born <S%G1096><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that He might redeem <S%G1805><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were under <S%G5259><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%> that we might receive <S%G618><s%> the adoption <S%G5206><s%> as sons. <S%G5206><s%>

And because <S%G3754><s%> you are sons, <S%G5207><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has sent <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of His Son <S%G5207><s%> into our hearts, <S%G2588><s%> crying, <S%G2896><s%> "Abba! Father! <S%G5><s%>"

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> you are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> a slave, <S%G1401><s%> but a son; <S%G5207><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> an heir <S%G2818><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

However <S%G235><s%> at that time, <S%G5119><s%> when you did not know <S%G3609><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> you were slaves <S%G1398><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> which by nature <S%G5449><s%> are no <S%G3361><s%> gods. <S%G2316><s%>

But now <S%G3568><s%> that you have come to know <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to be known <S%G1097><s%> by God, <S%G2316><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> is it that you turn <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G1994><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the weak <S%G772><s%> and worthless <S%G4434><s%> elemental <S%G4747><s%> things, <S%G4747><s%> to which <S%G3739><s%> you desire <S%G2309><s%> to be enslaved <S%G1398><s%> all <S%G509><s%> over <S%G509><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>?
You observe <S%G3906><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and months <S%G3376><s%> and seasons <S%G2540><s%> and years. <S%G1763><s%>
I fear <S%G5399><s%> for you, that perhaps <S%G4458><s%> I have labored <S%G2872><s%> over <S%G1519><s%> you in vain. <S%G1500><s%>
I beg <S%G1189><s%> of you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> as I [am], for I also <S%G2532><s%> [have become] as you [are.] You have done <S%G91><s%> me no <S%G3762><s%> wrong; <S%G91><s%>

but you know <S%G3609><s%> that it was because <S%G1223><s%> of a bodily <S%G4561><s%> illness <S%G769><s%> that I preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you the first <S%G4387><s%> time; <S%G4387><s%>

and that which <S%G3986><s%> was a trial <S%G3986><s%> to you in my bodily <S%G4561><s%> condition <S%G4561><s%> you did not despise <S%G1848><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> loathe, <S%G1609><s%> but you received <S%G1209><s%> me as an angel <S%G32><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> [Himself.]

Where <S%G4226><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is that sense <S%G3108><s%> of blessing <S%G3108><s%> you had? For I bear <S%G3140><s%> you witness, <S%G3140><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> you would have plucked <S%G1846><s%> out your eyes <S%G3788><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> them to me.
Have I therefore <S%G5620><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> your enemy <S%G2190><s%> by telling <S%G226><s%> you the truth <S%G226><s%>?

They eagerly <S%G2206><s%> seek <S%G2206><s%> you, not commendably, <S%G2573><s%> but they wish <S%G2309><s%> to shut <S%G1576><s%> you out, in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may seek <S%G2206><s%> them.

But it is good <S%G2570><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> to be eagerly <S%G2206><s%> sought <S%G2206><s%> in a commendable <S%G2570><s%> manner, <S%G2570><s%> and not only <S%G3440><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> I am <S%G3918><s%> present <S%G3918><s%> with you.
My children, <S%G5043><s%> with whom <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G5605><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> in labor <S%G5605><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is formed <S%G3445><s%> in you â€“

but I could wish <S%G2309><s%> to be present <S%G3918><s%> with you now <S%G737><s%> and to change <S%G236><s%> my tone, <S%G5456><s%> for I am <S%G639><s%> perplexed <S%G639><s%> about <S%G1722><s%> you.
Tell <S%G3004><s%> me, you who want <S%G2309><s%> to be under <S%G5259><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> do you not listen <S%G191><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%>?

For it is written <S%G1125><s%> that Abraham <S%G11><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> by the bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> by the free <S%G1658><s%> woman. <S%G1658><s%>

But the son by the bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and the son by the free <S%G1658><s%> woman <S%G1658><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the promise. <S%G1860><s%>

This <S%G3748><s%> is allegorically <S%G238><s%> speaking: <S%G238><s%> for these <S%G3778><s%> [women] are two <S%G1417><s%> covenants, <S%G1242><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> [proceeding] from Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> bearing <S%G1080><s%> children <S%G1080><s%> who are to be slaves; <S%G1397><s%> she is Hagar. <S%G28><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> Hagar <S%G28><s%> is Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> in Arabia, <S%G688><s%> and corresponds <S%G4960><s%> to the present <S%G3568><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> for she is in slavery <S%G1398><s%> with her children. <S%G5043><s%>
But the Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> above <S%G507><s%> is free; <S%G1658><s%> she is our mother. <S%G3384><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> barren <S%G4723><s%> woman <S%G4723><s%> who does not bear; <S%G5088><s%> Break <S%G4486><s%> forth <S%G4486><s%> and shout, <S%G994><s%> you who are not in labor; <S%G5605><s%> For more <S%G4183><s%> are the children <S%G5043><s%> of the desolate <S%G2048><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> of the one who has <S%G2192><s%> a husband. <S%G435><s%>"
And you brethren, <S%G80><s%> like <S%G2596><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> are children <S%G5043><s%> of promise. <S%G1860><s%>

But as at that time <S%G5119><s%> he who was born <S%G1080><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh <S%G4561><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> him [who was born] according <S%G2596><s%> to the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it is now <S%G3568><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

But what <S%G5101><s%> does the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>? "Cast <S%G1544><s%> out the bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> and her son, <S%G5207><s%> For the son <S%G5207><s%> of the bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> shall not be an heir <S%G2816><s%> with the son <S%G5207><s%> of the free <S%G1658><s%> woman. <S%G1658><s%>"
So <S%G1352><s%> then, <S%G1352><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> we are not children <S%G5043><s%> of a bondwoman, <S%G3814><s%> but of the free <S%G1658><s%> woman. <S%G1658><s%>
